Search Engine Marketing Professional - Google SEO Expert, Professional Blogger

Afzal Khan is “Electrical Engineer” by education and well renowned Search Engine Marketing Professional. He has been around the Indian Search Industry Arena for quite a while, probably longer than 8 years. He has worked with well renowned organization like Hexaware Technologies, SIFY technologies, Reliance Infostream, SEOValley Solutions. He is an Bruce Clay Inc. Certified SEO Consultant.

Afzal Khan is currently working as Manager (SEO) with US Digital Media Inc. at Phoenix, Arizona Office.

Afzal Khan mostly writes on Online Marketing, where his main focus is on Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Corporate Blogging, Social Media etc for small/medium size business and independent professional’s. He has a great blog having all resource, articles, news for Online media professionals and business owners. He actively publish articles on Online Business Marketing topic.

Afzal Khan holds excellent command and understanding on how Search Engine Algorithm works, being a Search Engine Marketing Professional and specializing in SEO he is remarkable with his search engine strategies. Simply Google for “Google SEO Experts”, “SEO Experts Resume”, “Professional Indian Blogger”, “SEO/SEM Experts” are few of keywords where his blog/website’s are on Google, Yahoo & Bing 1st position.

Favorite Blogger’s whom Afzal Khan admires reading are Danny Sullivan, Matt Cutts, Lee Odden, Rand Fishkin, Aaron Wall, Amit Aggrawal and Shama Hyder.

Afzal Khan (SEO Expert) - Online Marketing Professional’s Summary:-

# Search Engine Optimization: Keyword Market Research on targeted markets searching habits. Created competition analysis reports, rank reports, analyzed existing data from server logs and created statistical analysis to project current search engine traffic patterns. Used ethical “white-hat” Search Engine Optimization techniques to produce solid high rankings for numerous keywords in Google, Yahoo, MSN & other search engines.

# Pay Per Click (PPC) Campaign: Managing & Running Google Adword PPC campaign for companyâ€™s web portal delivering best possible conversion and traffic solution to web portal.

# SEO Management: Managed relationship with internal/external SEO/SEM Agencies, co-coordinating internal web marketing team by motivating and guiding them. Work with Design and Code Teams to ensure Design and Coding maintains SEO Standards set forth delivering best possible ranking and traffic solution to web portal.

# Internet Marketing: Developed Company/Product Branding strategies with high success rates. Created in-house research plans, which included: Focus and Peer Groups, Online Polls and Public Awareness functions, Blog and Forumâ€™s Posting. Manage all facets of search engine marketing campaigns including paid and natural search.

# Social Media (Web 2.0) Marketing: Web 2.0–> Other marketing methods to increase the website traffic mainly article submission, press releases, social networking & bookmarking.
